main event: A military observer spotted a small, silver object moving slowly across the sky in Morro Bay, California on April 24, 1958.
interesting points: The object was the size of a 'head of a pin' at 300 yards distance and moved from northwest to southeast, varying in altitude.
The object was observed for about 5 minutes before it disappeared behind clouds.
The observer was unsure if the object was an aircraft, an artillery reflection, or something else.
There was no sound coming from the object.
The object was observed visually from the ground by a military observer.
